decision_conditions: Amended Condition 20The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the plans and accommodation schedule listed below, showing 2 x M4(3) and 3 x M4(2) Building Regulation Standard units on the ground floor and 18 x M4(1) Building RegulationsStandard units on the upper floors:V00002-AQP-RH-GF-GA-A-500 Rev P02 PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLANV00002-AQP-RH-ZZ-GA-A-4000 Rev C02 FLAT TYPE RH-01-SRV00002-AQP-RH-ZZ-GA-A-4001 Rev C01 FLAT TYPE RH-02-SRV00002-AQP-RH-ZZ-GA-A-4003 Rev C01 FLAT TYPE RH-04-SRV00002-AQP-RH-ZZ--SA-S-0001 Accommodation ScheduleReason: So that an adequate level of accessible units are provided in accordance with Policies D5, D6 and D7 of the London Plan (2021), Policy DM13 of the RBK Core Strategy (2012) and the Mayor's Housing SPG (2016).
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 22/02196/CREG3 ((Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 20/02213/CREG3 (Partial demolition of the existing Roupell House building and erection of a part 3-storey, part 4-storey building comprising 23 residential units with associated landscaping, refuse and cycle storage, public pathway improvements to the eastern boundary and landscaping improvements to the existing communal amenity space to the rear of 37-40 York Road (Dale Court)) dated 15/03/2021. Variations to include internal reconfiguration, alterations to the approved bin and cycle store, alterations to fenestration and rainwater goods and reconfiguration of the north elevation)) to amend the wording of Condition 20 so that it becomes a compliance condition requiring the scheme to be built out in accordance with the relevant plans.
